headline: Stock-Split Watch: Is AT&T Next?
summary: The most recent AT&T stock split was a 1-for-5 reverse split in 2002.  The telecom company has announced share buybacks.  AT&T (NYSE: T) has been one of the better defensive stocks in 2025, as it's currently up 20.2% on the year.
